DOC.detailed_description: The investigator go ascertain antibiotic burden reduce tele dermatology use . There two arm study : 1 . Feedback group 2 . Non feedback group All subject randomise either group , subject take photo face answer question baseline , visit 2 ( 1 month ) , visit 3 ( 2 month ) , visit 4 ( 3 month ) . The investigator use measurement acne grade ( patient grading , investigator global assessment , lesion counting , global acne grade ) reduce/taper antibiotic feedback group .
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 15 year old Subjects prescribe doxycycline minocycline physician acne vulgaris initiate treatment yet . Subjects use isotretinoin last 6 week Those used oral antibiotic within last 4 week Those initiate change brand oral contraceptive pill within last one month .
